name: .RIQ File Extension
summary: Learn about .RIQ files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a RIQ file with Heaven Studio, to edit and play the level it contains. If you want to extract the audio and JSON file a RIQ file contains, rename it to use the .zip extension and open it as you would any ZIP archive.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
